description:
Luffy, Law, Kid, Zoro, and Killer keep landing hard blows against Kaido in tandem despite the arguing. However, when Big Mom steps in and unleashes powerful lightning strikes, the tide turns for all except one of the rookies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Barrage of Powerful Techniques! The Fierce Attacks of the Worst Generation!
Déluge d`attaques. La génération terrible s`acharne !
Ein Feuerwerk der Ultratechniken! – Die Schlimmste Generation bläst zum Angriff!
Oowaza Renpatsu! Saiaku no Sedai no Moukou!
Шквал сильнейших атак! Яростный натиск худшего поколения!
大技連発! 最悪の世代の猛攻!
